message.content:
Dear Hiring Manager,

I am writing to express my interest in the internship opportunity at CertiK. With a GPA of 3.4 and a strong background in Computer Science, I believe I am well-suited for this role and can contribute to the fast-moving environment at your blockchain startup.

I have a solid foundation in computer science fundamentals and proficiency in backend languages such as Python, Java, and Golang. My expertise in object-oriented design, data structures and algorithms, and distributed systems align perfectly with the requirements of the internship. Additionally, I possess excellent written and verbal communication skills, allowing me to effectively engage in client-facing meetings and contribute to technical blogs.

What sets me apart is my ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic working environment. As a self-driven problem solver, I enjoy tackling complex challenges and am always eager to expand my knowledge and skills. I am also a strong team player, striving to make a positive impact and collaborate effectively with my colleagues.

Based on the compensation range provided, I am confident that my skills and experience make me a valuable asset to CertiK. I am enthusiastic about the prospect of joining your team and contributing to the success of your renowned blockchain security company.

Thank you for considering my application. I am excited about the opportunity to discuss further how I can contribute to CertiK and its mission.

Sincerely,

[Your Name]
